name: VXQuest Mackinac Island Demo
summary: A special edition demo of my RPG Maker game, VXQuest.
short_description:
This is a special edition demo of my RPG Maker game, temporarily titled VXQuest. In this game, your mission is to help the Good King defeat the Evil King. This seems simple, but things soon spiral out of control.

Features:
*A fun, exciting story
*Hours of bonus side-quests
*References to other classic video games such as Zelda, Final Fantasy, Mario, and more
*A secret Boat Race minigame
*Early access to certain areas of the game, such as the Arena (this is only available to my Mackinac friends, that's you guys)
